document_data.mainbody:
Calantha was a member of Ship Rethnor of Luskan in the late 15 century DR. 
Calanthas family was from Waterdeep, but as she did not get along with them, she eventually moved to Luskan, where she joined Ship Rethnor. She traveled a bit, but, finding life as a sailor hard, she ultimately found work as a night watchman at the docks.
Around 1490 DR, Calantha encountered the Champion of the Burning Dawn in the Cutlass in Luskan.
